brainly_data.question: How does the anatomy of a shark help it survive?
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: How does the anatomy of a shark help it survive?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: It is built similarly to an airplane because its tail and fins help it glide fast through water. Hope this helps.
